# User Stories

## US-1: Authentication @feature1

As a user, I want to log in with my credentials so that I can access the system.

### Acceptance Criteria

- Valid credentials return JWT token
- Invalid credentials return error

## US-2: Registration @feature2

As a new user, I want to register an account so that I can use the system.

### Acceptance Criteria

- Valid data creates account
- Duplicate email returns error
